entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued November 09 at 6:43PM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Two Impactful Winter Storms Sunday Through Thursday... Two consecutive winter storms are expected to impact the West Coast and Western Interior starting on Sunday and could bring a combination of winter impacts including heavy snow, strong winds, and the potential for elevated surf along the coast. The first system will bring a strong front to the West Coast on

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued November 10 at 4:39AM EST by NWS
entry.summary: ...AREAS OF DENSE FOG THIS MORNING... Areas of dense fog have developed this morning from across the northeast florida and southeast georgia coast west to the I-95 corridor. entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued November 10 at 3:24AM EST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Enhanced Fire Danger this Afternoon... The combination of a very dry atmosphere, low fuel moisture and a light breeze will result in an enhanced fire danger this afternoon. Consider burning on a different day. Be sure camp fires are completely extinguished.

entry.summary: ...Freezing Fog Along Route 212 & 11... Freezing Fog has developed along Route 212 and 11 impacting portions of Moro Plantation, Merrill and Knowles Corner. Watch for potentially icy roads until temperatures to rise above freezing which is expected by 930AM.
